official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for charity care provided by physicians.
short_title: Charity Care Tax Deduction for Physicians Act of 2012
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text: Charity Care Tax Deduction for Physicians Act of 2012 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a physician a tax deduction equal to the amount such physician would have otherwise charged for charity medical care provided on a volunteer or pro bono basis. Limits the allowable amount of such deduction to 10% of such physician's gross income for the taxable year.
